name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
categoryPath: Auto & Tires/Motor Oil, Transmission Fluid & Car Lubricant/Transmission Fluid, Brake Fluid & Power Steering Fluid

reviews.name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
reviews.reviewText: It's inaccurate, the label on the bottle is correct though. Mercon V is only compatible with Mercon/Dexron III.
reviews.title: DON'T GO BY THE WALMART DESCRIPTION!

reviews.name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
reviews.reviewText: My only negative issue with this product is the difficulty in obtaining it. It took me a month, and four cities around south AL to find ten quarts of this fluid.
reviews.title: Works great

reviews.name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
reviews.reviewText: have only used for 1000 miles, but works as it should......
reviews.title: economical fluid

reviews.name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
reviews.reviewText: Had to order extra, for my 1997 Ford Ranger transmission, did a flush on it and wanted to make sure I put the proper fluid back in...wish my Walmart carried this in the gallon jugs
reviews.title: 1997 Ford Ranger automatic transmission fluid

reviews.name: Super Tech MERCON V Automatic Transmission Fluid, 1qt
reviews.reviewText: Mercon V is the fluid my Lincoln requires, and this is at a good price.
reviews.title: Works for me
